steps.nodeStepDescription: This weapon causes kinetic damage.

Standard sight.
A lightweight design, good for recoil control.

Snapshot sight. 
Excellent handling.
Superb target acquisition.

Increases range and accuracy.
Harder to handle.
 Decreases carried Ammo capacity.
Volatile payload explodes on impact, dealing a portion of the weapon's damage in an area.
Increases carried Ammo capacity.
Increases Attack Power, allowing this weapon to cause more damage.
Kills with this weapon grant bonus damage for a short time.
Kills with this weapon reduce the cooldown of your grenade.
The last round in a magazine deals bonus damage.
A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.
One random bullet in the magazine causes considerable bonus damage.
Missing a shot has a chance to return ammo directly to the magazine.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
Radar stays active while aiming down this weapon's sights.
Reloading this weapon has a chance to grant a larger than normal magazine.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
Kills with this weapon have the chance to grant bonus reserve ammo.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
Kills with this weapon have the chance to grant bonus ammo to the magazine.
Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.

Lightning-fast handling.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.
